full_text: What are some other countries where home cooking is considered best or where restaurant/street food is best, and what are some other characteristics of that culture that might correlate? Communal vs individualistic, maybe? https://t.co/UL66C3PU9t

quoted_status.full_text: There's an interesting divide in food culture between those where home cooking is the best (Italian and at least some parts of the US) and those where restaurant/hawker/street food is the best (Singapore and according to Victoria Tai, Mexico). https://t.co/snSZlCOX17

localize.full_text: 家庭料理が一番とされる国、レストランやストリートフードが一番とされる国、またその文化に関連する他の特徴は何でしょうか？共同体的か個人主義的か、とか？https://t.co/UL66C3PU9t
